      (4.5,1.0)(2.6,1.0)(2.6,1.85)(2.7,1.95)(2.7,3.5)

   \psline[linecolor=sblinehighlight,arrows=<->](0.5,0.93)(1.5,0.93)

   \psline(2.2,3.5)(3.2,3.5)
   \uput{4pt}[180](2.2,3.5){B}

   \uput{3pt}[180](2.2,3.2){A'}
   \pscircle[fillstyle=solid,fillcolor=yellow](4.5,1.0){0.3}
   \rput{45}(4.5,1.0){
      \psline(-0.3,0)(0.3,0)
      \psline(0,-0.3)(0,0.3)
   }
   \uput{10pt}[-90](4.5,1.0){L}

      \psscalebox{0.4}{\eye}
   }
   \uput{10pt}[0](2.53,0){BP}
